articles.author: David Crossland, Berlin
articles.title: Europeans favour Angela Merkel as next EU leader - The Times
articles.description: Angela Merkel is seen by many Europeans as a future EU president when she ends her time as Germany’s chancellor. In a survey, 41 per cent said that they would b
articles.content:
Angela Merkel is seen by many Europeans as a future EU president when she ends her time as Germanys chancellor.
In a survey, 41 per cent said that they would back Merkel, who is stepping down after … [+510 chars]
